S02mahpratu:1126: sarvaduṣṭayakṣarākṣasabhūtapretapiśācāpasmāraḍākinīgrahavighnavināyakādayaḥ sarve 'sya mahāpratisaravidyārājaprabhāvena na śaktā viheṭhanāṃ kartum /
S02mahpratu:1127: upasaṃkramatāṃ ca teṣām ayaṃ mahāvidyārājā smartavyā /
S02mahpratu:1128: tatas te sarvaduṣṭacittā vidyādharasya vaśyā ājñāśravaṇavidheyā bhavanti /
S02mahpratu:1129: asyā evānubhāvena yad uta mahāpratisarāvidyārājñyā na cāsya śatrubhayaṃ bhaviṣyati /
S02mahpratu:1130: anatikramaṇīyaś ca bhaviṣyati sarvaśatrugaṇai rājarājamahāmātyair brāhmaṇagṛhapatibhiś ca /
S02mahpratu:1131: antaśo 'pi ca vadhyārho vadhakapuruṣair ucchritāny api śastrāṇi khaṇḍakhaṇḍaṃ gacchanti pāṃsumayānīva viśīryante /
S02mahpratu:1134: [48] rakṣoghnaṃ paramaṃ hy etat pavitraṃ pāpanāśanam /
S02mahpratu:1138: strīpuṃsayoḥ parā rakṣā vidyeyaṃ hi mahābalā /
S02mahpratu:1141: patha utpatham āpanna etāṃ vidyām anusmaret // 4 //
S02mahpratu:1142: panthānaṃ labhate śīghraṃ bhojanaṃ pānam uttamam /
S02mahpratu:1143: kāyena manasā vācā yat kṛtaṃ pūrvajanmasu // 5 //
S02mahpratu:1144: aśubhaṃ bahuvidhaṃ kiṃcit tat sarvaṃ kṣapayiṣyati /
S02mahpratu:1145: smaraṇād dhāraṇāc caiva udgrahāl lekhanād api // 6 //
S02mahpratu:1148: evaṃ hi dharmarase prāpte pāpā gacchanti saṃkṣayam /
S02mahpratu:1149: sidhyante sarvakāryāṇi manasā yad yad īpsitam // 8 //
S02mahpratu:1151: rājāgnir udakaṃ caiva vidyud vā taskaro 'pi vā // 9 //
S02mahpratu:1153: te sarve pralayaṃ yānti vidyāyā lakṣajāpataḥ // 10 //
S02mahpratu:1156: sarveṣu caiva sthāneṣu imāṃ vidyāṃ prayojayet /
S02mahpratu:1158: sidhyanty ayatnatas tāni vidyāto nātra saṃśayaḥ /
S02mahpratu:1162: caturaḥ pūrṇakumbhāṃś ca sthāpayed vidhinā budhaḥ // 2 //
S02mahpratu:1163: puṣpāṇy avakiret tatra dhūpayed dhūpam uttamam /
S02mahpratu:1165: pūrvavad gandhapuṣpāṃś ca dadyāc cātra vidhānavit /
S02mahpratu:1166: catasras tīrikāḥ sthāpyāḥ sarvāś ca paṭṭabaddhikāḥ // 4 //
S02mahpratu:1170: saptaśo japtayā cāsya rakṣāṃ kuryād vicakṣaṇaḥ // 6 //
S02mahpratu:1173: bhūyaś ca sapta vārān vai balikumbhasumantritam /
S02mahpratu:1175: ity evaṃ dakṣiṇe pārśve kṣipeta sapta eva tu /
S02mahpratu:1176: paścimāyāṃ ca saptaiva uttarāyāṃ tathā diśi // 9 //
S02mahpratu:1177: adha ūrdhvaṃ tu saptaiva kṛtā rakṣā bhaviṣyati /
S02mahpratu:1180: nāsty asyāḥ parā kācid rakṣāvidyā tridhātuke // 11 //
S02mahpratu:1181: [50] na tasya mṛtyur na jarā na rogo
S02mahpratu:1193: [51] vajrapāṇiś ca yakṣendra indraś caiva śacīpatiḥ /
S02mahpratu:1196: te ca sarve mahānāgā devatā ṛṣayas tathā // 2 //
S02mahpratu:1197: asurā garuḍā gandharvāḥ kiṃnarāś ca mahoragāḥ /
S02mahpratu:1199: likhitāṃ dhārayet prājño bāhau baddhvā maharddhikām /
S02mahpratu:1200: mahatīṃ labhate pūjāṃ saṃpadaṃ cāpi nityaśaḥ // 4 //
S02mahpratu:1201: [52] idam avocad bhagavān āttamanās te ca bhikṣavas te ca bodhisattvāḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandann iti /
